item.title: The Trump Administration Wants Immigrants to Self-Deport. It’s a Shit Show
item.description: The Trump administration has been virtually begging immigrants in the US to self-deport, even offering money. But some immigrants say it’s been nearly...

item.title: Google Photos’ 2025 Recap turns to Gemini to find your highlights
item.description: The Google Photos Recap will use Gemini's AI to find your memorable moments throughout the year, and adds new metrics, like a 'selfie' count.

item.title: Amazon Fire TV’s new AI feature lets you jump to scenes by describing them to Alexa+
item.description: Amazon says you can describe the scene to Alexa by mentioning details like the actor or character's name, or a memorable quote.

item.title: Waymo starts autonomous testing in Philadelphia
item.description: Baltimore, Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, and St. Louis join a long list of cities where the company is gearing up to offer robotaxi rides.

item.title: Autolane is building ‘air traffic control’ for autonomous vehicles
item.description: And the Palo Alto-based startup has raised $7.4 million to do that.
